page.title: 20SUTTON CENTRE COMPLEX.
page.content: Sutton in Asfield was chosen by Nottinghamshire County Council to be the location of an experiment in Community Education.The Sutton Centre complex houses both a large Comprehensive School and a leisure centre.The school itself was designed as a Community School,with its facilities open to the general public. The most interesting facet of this concept is the "eleventh session"-the school is open in the evenings,and classes are run and staffed by the teachers at the school as part of their regular duties.Adults and children alike attend these classes. Situated in the very heart of the town,the school/leisure complex provides excellent facilities and a meeting place for all the people of Sutton. D.LITTLEWOOD.
